thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Lara

author: Lara
title: Lara
text:
To be honest I was sceptical at the beginning. I heard horrible stories of hosts and the organisation that comes along with it. Therefore, I was not sure if I should risk it. In the end I did and I am happy I did so. Although my life abroad will be from April - June 2017, the organisation itself was the easiest ever. I registered and texted a number of hosts. All of them replied the same day which was more than fantastic but also a bit sad because from the writing all of them appeared to be so lovely. In the end I decided to pick one, easy as that - no trouble, no doubt.
I am really looking forward the host and will keep you updated by June if it was worth it.
